TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
The Orcs are nearby, and they still have the prisoners.
The Orcs are nearby, and they still have the prisoners.
The Orcs are nearby, and they still have the prisoners.
The Orcs are nearby, and they still have the prisoners.
Good. We should be able to surprise them.
Good. We should be able to surprise them.
Good. We should be able to surprise them.
Good. We should be able to surprise them.
I thought you recruited me to fight Undead, not track Orcs...
I thought you recruited me to fight Undead, not track Orcs...
I thought you recruited me to fight Undead, not track Orcs...
I thought you recruited me to fight Undead, not track Orcs...
So did I. But we go where we're needed. Besides, when I first met you, weren't you fighting Orcs in the Borderlands?
So did I. But we go where we're needed. Besides, when I first met you, weren't you fighting Orcs in the Borderlands?
So did I. But we go where we're needed. Besides, when I first met you, weren't you fighting Orcs in the Borderlands?
So did I. But we go where we're needed. Besides, when I first met you, weren't you fighting Orcs in the Borderlands?
Indeed... But, I was tracking a bunch of Ghouls who had fled into the forest at the time. The Orcs ambushed me.
Indeed... But, I was tracking a bunch of Ghouls who had fled into the forest at the time. The Orcs ambushed me.
Indeed... But, I was tracking a bunch of Ghouls who had fled into the forest at the time. The Orcs ambushed me.
Indeed... But, I was tracking a bunch of Ghouls who had fled into the forest at the time. The Orcs ambushed me.
Well, I'm sure we'll have plenty of Undead to deal with in the coming days.
